name: Maze Run Escape
description:
MazeRunEscape is simple online multiplayer game where 4 players compete to get the trophy first .

this small prototype I made to test Gamesparks  real time multiplayer services  (player position , in game events and  real time chat) , player authentication  , matchmaking and  data base .

this is just a simple prototype made for learning purposes if you want to test the demo you can open 4 tabs simultaneously  to play a quick match 

it's recommended  to use 16:9 ratio (1024*720 for example) for the best experience 

Rules : 

Controls : arrows 

first player reach the trophy wins
